Blick Premier Twist Lock Knife and Blades
   Description Photos Reviews
↓ off List!

Get a fresh blade — safely — in just a snap!

With the Blick Premier Twist Lock Knife, safety and convenience are brought together for virtually effortless cuts on heavy-duty materials including linoleum, rubber, leather, vinyl, posterboard, mounting board, foamboard, drywall, roofing, insulation, carpet, and more.

Unlike most comparable knives equipped with single-hone steel blades, our knife boasts high-tempered Japanese black steel blades — offering an extremely sharp edge that stays sharper over multiple cuts.

With the Blick Premier Twist Lock Knife, you never have to worry about the blade slipping, thanks to a ratchet safety mechanism that holds the blade firmly in place as you cut. Just give it a twist and you're good to go. And sharp new blade is always at the ready, thanks to the segmented blade design — just use a pair of pliers to snap off the dull edge.

The impact-resistant ABS plastic handle is lightweight and contoured for comfortable use without hand fatigue. It also includes a safe, convenient, built-in storage compartment for spare blades.

The Blick Premier Twist Lock Knife comes with three segmented blade units, each containing 8 segments (for a total of 24 blades).

Use this knife only with Blick Premier Twist Lock Knife Blades, sold in a package of five segmented blade units, each containing 8 segments (for a total of 40 blades).
